artist: Artist: Toyohara Chikanobu; Author: Ryūsuitei Tanekiyo; Publisher: Kobayashi Tetsujirō
creditline: Gift of Sue Y.S. Kimm and Seymour Grufferman
description: red and green ground; man in western dress at left; man with dog at center; woman with purple umbrella at right; dog at center pulls on tie on woman's garment; three sheets affixed to backing paper and mount paper
inscription: right: 上　艶嬢毒蛇淵　三編; center: 中　柳水亭種清編輯; left: 下　楊洲斎周延画　延寿堂
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Bright Young Girl in the Abyss of a Poisonous Snake (Iromusume dokuja no fuchi 艶嬢毒蛇淵)
title: Covers of the three booklets "Bright Young Girl in the Abyss of a Poisonous Snake," vol. 3
